heading: HR00501
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, REGARDING MANILA WATER'S 780% HIKE WARNING IN THE EVENT THAT THE SUPREME COURT DOES NOT REVERSE ITS DECISION TO PENALIZE THE COMPANY FOR ITS FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE CLEAN WATER ACT
status: Pending with the Committee on GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY since 2019-12-11
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00501
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, REGARDING MANILA WATER'S 780% HIKE WARNING IN THE EVENT THAT THE SUPREME COURT DOES NOT REVERSE ITS DECISION TO PENALIZE THE COMPANY FOR ITS FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE CLEAN WATER ACT

DATE FILED : 2019-11-06
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOOD GOVERNMENT AND PUBLIC ACCOUNTABILITY ON 2019-12-11
